name: rumbly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
making a continuous low sound: Her stomach was making strange rumbly noises. When he finally spoke, his voice was rumbly and deep.
More examplesFewer examplesI'm taken back to my tiny childhood bedroom with its rumbly little radio.His voice was pleasantly rumbly.He was singing along to the tune in a low rumbly baritone.He is polite and charming to everyone in his rumbly drawl.They were starting to have rumbly bellies after sitting in the car all morning.
